title: How long is a typical personal statement for graduate school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Typically it should not be more than 2 pages. A section on your background and the work you have done till date. The second section on your area of interest and the reasons for the choice. The final section should focus on the specific area you would like to work on and your career plans. Please do consult your seniors in college or an education counsellor for more details. All the best.
